channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Updated timeline for attempted Trump assassination; crypto’s impact on the election
item.description: The FBI has released a more detailed timeline of the attempted assassination of Former President Donald Trump. And, how crypto is impacting the primary election in Arizona.
item.content:encoded:
The FBI has released a more detailed timeline of the attempted assassination of Former President Donald Trump. And, how crypto is impacting the primary election in Arizona.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Israel has delayed the evacuation of sick children in Gaza
item.description: Israel agreed to allow 150 seriously ill and injured children in Gaza to leave for medical treatment. But after an attack blamed on Lebanese Hezbollah, Israel's prime minister suspended that approval.
item.content:encoded: Israel agreed to allow 150 seriously ill and injured children in Gaza to leave for medical treatment. But after an attack blamed on Lebanese Hezbollah, Israel's prime minister suspended that approval.
item.dc:creator: Jane Arraf

item.title: There are primary races in Arizona but one in particular is getting a lot of attention
item.description: A Democratic primary for a House seat in Phoenix has drawn GOP interests. The Winkelvoss twins of Facebook fame, the crypto industry and a major Republican donor are trying to sway the results.
item.content:encoded: A Democratic primary for a House seat in Phoenix has drawn GOP interests. The Winkelvoss twins of Facebook fame, the crypto industry and a major Republican donor are trying to sway the results.
item.dc:creator: Claudia Grisales

item.title: President Biden calls for term limits and ethics reforms for Supreme Court justices
item.description: President Biden is floating a plan to reshape the Supreme Court, including term limits for Justices. NPR's Steve Inskeep talks with Michael Waldman, president of the Brennan Center, about Biden's objectives.
item.content:encoded: President Biden is floating a plan to reshape the Supreme Court, including term limits for Justices. NPR's Steve Inskeep talks with Michael Waldman, president of the Brennan Center, about Biden's objectives.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Ozempic's biggest side effect: Turning Denmark into a 'pharmastate'?
item.description: Novo Nordisk is powering Denmark's economy with huge sales of Ozempic. But could its stratospheric growth pose a risk?
item.content:encoded:
Novo Nordisk is powering Denmark's economy with huge sales of Ozempic. But could its stratospheric growth pose a risk?

(Image credit: Mario Tama/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Sofia Shchukina

item.title: McDonald's is losing customers to inflation
item.description: McDonald announced a drop in sales for the first time since 2020, when restaurants closed because of the pandemic. This time, it's because of inflation. (Story aired on ATC on July 29, 2024.)
item.content:encoded: McDonald announced a drop in sales for the first time since 2020, when restaurants closed because of the pandemic. This time, it's because of inflation. (Story aired on ATC on July 29, 2024.)
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh

item.title: Inflation is pinching Americans — but they are still splurging on their pets
item.description: Americans are being forced to cut corners as they deal with lingering inflation — just not when it comes to providing for their furry companions.
item.content:encoded:
Americans are being forced to cut corners as they deal with lingering inflation — just not when it comes to providing for their furry companions.

(Image credit: Julie Leopo for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Lola Murti

item.title: Amid lawsuits, new autopsies link Texas prisoner deaths to extreme heat
item.description: Records obtained by The Texas Newsroom indicate that extreme heat contributed to the deaths of several state prison inmates in recent years.
item.content:encoded: Records obtained by The Texas Newsroom indicate that extreme heat contributed to the deaths of several state prison inmates in recent years.
item.dc:creator: Lauren McGaughy

item.title: It’s taken 2 years to get the Kids Online Safety Act to this point
item.description: The Kids Online Safety Act is set to pass the Senate, but some groups oppose it. It’s a rare bipartisan bill with broad support.
item.content:encoded: The Kids Online Safety Act is set to pass the Senate, but some groups oppose it. It’s a rare bipartisan bill with broad support.
item.dc:creator: Dara Kerr

item.title: Illegal crossings hit Biden-era low as migrants wait longer for entry
item.description: The number of migrants trying to cross the southern U.S. border illegally has gone down significantly. But migrants still face long waits using a government app for asylum claims.
item.content:encoded:
The number of migrants trying to cross the southern U.S. border illegally has gone down significantly. But migrants still face long waits using a government app for asylum claims.

(Image credit: Paul Ratje for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán
